name.ch: 精密機械製造實務與製程模擬

goal.ch: 精密機械製造為許多工程領域的基礎學科與組成架構之一，更為機械系及許多工程學系訂為大學部必修基礎科目，本課程乃授與學生必要的精密機械製造知識，包含了解生產機械零件、零組件可採用之加工法，所需之設備；加工後成品之特性，生產成本等，作為日後學習相關進階課程及各式工程應用之用。本課程主要教學目標乃在培養學生在從事相關製造程序設計與分析時，能夠具有基本的能力與素養。
goal.en: "This course aims to give an overview of all aspects in precision manufacturing and Process. Starting from the traditional processes such as casting, metal forming (forging, sheet metal forming), machining (turning, grinding, milling) and welding, the modern day manufacturing of integrated circuits will also be covered."

outline.ch: 精密機械製造為許多工程領域的基礎學科與組成架構之一，更為機械系及許多工程學系訂為大學部必修基礎科目，本進階課程延續大學部機械製造基本課程，進一步授與研究所學生必要的精密機械製造實務知識與相關塑性力學原理，並包含生產機械零件、零組件可採用之加工法，所需之設備；加工後成品之特性，生產成本等，由基礎課程逐步進入至進階的專業實務領域中，作為日後實務及各式工程應用之需要。課程內容亦將介紹實際之金屬成型(鍛造、鈑金成型)與金屬切削製程之有限元素分析等，並將各應用領域的製程模擬知識加以整合及運用，藉由基礎理論、製程模擬與實際應用結合，培養理論與工程技術兼具的精密機械製造實務與模擬相關人才。
outline.en:
"This course covers the following topics:
Subject
Introduction (Ch.1) , Material Properties & Attributes (Ch. 3-mechanical properties,Ch.5-dimensions, surfaces, etc.)
Solidification Processes (Ch. 9- fundamentals,Ch.10- metal casting processes)
Plastics Manufacturing (Ch. 12- shaping processes for polymers)
Particulate Processing (Ch.14 – powder metallurgy)
Metal Forming and Sheet Metalworking (Ch. 16-18)
Review, paper review and midterm project proposal
Material Removal Processes(Ch.19 - theory)
Material Removal Processes(Ch.20 – operations and tools)
Material Removal Processes(Ch.21 – cutting tools, Ch.22 – economic and design consideration)
Material Removal Processes(Ch.23 – grinding, Ch. 24 nontraditional processes), Ch.25- heat treatment
Joining and Assembly Processes (Ch.27-fundamentals, Ch.28-processes)
Joining and Assembly Processes (Ch.29-brazing,soldering and adhesive bonding, Ch.30-mechanical assembly)
Review. Exam  (Th. 10-12 am, typ. 5-7 problems)
Special Processing and Assembly Technologies (Ch. 31-rapid prototyping)
Special Processing and Assembly Technologies (Ch. 32- IC processing)
Special Processing and Assembly Technologies (Ch. 33-electronic assembly, Ch.34-micro-nano-fabrication)
Quality Control and Inspection (Ch.39), conclusion
Final project"

textbook.ch:
"Textbook:
1. Principles of Modern Manufacturing, SI version and 4th Edition, Mikell P. Groover, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., Hoboken, New Jersey
2. 自編講義及教材
References:
1. Fundamentals of Modern Manufacturing, Materials, Processes, and Systems, Third Edition
Mikell P. Groover, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., Hoboken, New Jersey
2. Kalpakjian and Schmid, “Manufacturing Processes for Engineering Materials, 5th edition.
3. J. Schey, “Introduction to Manufacturing Processes, 3rd edition."
textbook.en:
"Textbook:
1. Principles of Modern Manufacturing, SI version and 4th Edition, Mikell P. Groover, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., Hoboken, New Jersey
2. 自編講義及教材
References:
1. Fundamentals of Modern Manufacturing, Materials, Processes, and Systems, Third Edition
Mikell P. Groover, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., Hoboken, New Jersey
2. Kalpakjian and Schmid, “Manufacturing Processes for Engineering Materials, 5th edition.
3. J. Schey, “Introduction to Manufacturing Processes, 3rd edition."

gradMethod.ch:
"– 20% participation and in-class 10-min quiz
– Midterm proposal & exam, each 20%.
– Final project, 40%"
gradMethod.en:
"– 20% participation and in-class 10-min quiz
– Midterm proposal & exam, each 20%.
– Final project, 40%"

en.competencies: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation
